programme.title: Christmas at the Amish Bakery
programme.desc: After leaving her Amish community in her youth, book editor Sarah finds herself in desperate need of a new cookbook to save her job. She returns to the family farm to reconnect with her roots, and works with an outsider to save her family's bakery.

programme.title: The Christmas Venue
programme.desc: Losing faith in Christmas after a rough breakup, Cait heads home and meets Drew.

programme.title: Holiday for Hire
programme.desc: Katie is excited to finally have a boyfriend to bring home for the holidays. However, when she gets dumped by her boyfriend Dean the day before she is supposed to go, she hires Josh to act as him for Christmas with her family.

programme.title: Christmas at the Amish Bakery
programme.desc: After leaving her Amish community in her youth, book editor Sarah finds herself in desperate need of a new cookbook to save her job. She returns to the family farm to reconnect with her roots, and works with an outsider to save her family's bakery.

programme.title: Being Erica
programme.desc: Dr. Tom is forced to face old demons; Kai returns on a regret.

programme.title: Being Erica
programme.desc: Erica's latest therapy session has uncovered a shocking secret; Dr. Tom has a time-altering solution.

programme.title: Being Erica
programme.desc: Erica is offered an incredible career opportunity.

programme.title: Heart of the Manor
programme.desc: On the eve of her sister's wedding, Real Estate agent Lisa Bentron finds herself in competition with handsome developer Matthew Wallace when he wants to buy her family's historic estate.

programme.title: Steal Your Heart
programme.desc: A mix up over a purchase leaves amateur jeweler Melissa being enlisted by the CEO of the biggest jewelry company in Miami to help create a bridal line with the CEO's too-serious son, Jake.

programme.title: Betting on the Bride
programme.desc: A womanizer bets that he can get someone to accept his marriage proposal after dating him for just 30 days. What he doesn't know is that the woman he has targeted has some serious commitment issues.

programme.title: Picture Perfect Romance
programme.desc: Zoey Ross gave up on love and her passion for wedding photography after her fiance, Todd, left her at the alter five years ago. When a childhood friend insists that she be their wedding photographer, she reluctantly accepts and finds herself again.

programme.title: Christmas Casanova
programme.desc: A podcaster in need of catchy Christmas content offers to help Daniyal win over his love in exchange for the ability to record the process. As the two work together, it becomes clear that Daniyal might be trying to win over the wrong woman.

programme.title: It's a Christmas Thing
programme.desc: When 9-year-old Megan dedicates her Christmas wish to helping her mom Cara find love, her letter goes viral. Cara realizes that what she was looking for may have been on her doorstop all along.

programme.title: A Very Corgi Christmas
programme.desc: When workaholic Lauren and her son Jacob return home for the holidays, her hopes for a quiet visit are quickly dashed when she runs into Ben.

programme.title: Love at the Christmas Contest
programme.desc: Angie enters a tree decorating contest to honor the memory of her mother. To Angie's surprise, her high school sweetheart, David, and his daughter, Gabby, have entered the contest as well.

programme.title: A Merry Single Christmas
programme.desc: A woman attempts to rekindle her Christmas spirit, but things get complicated when her ex shows up.
